column5: Would any one know how the road to Detour Lake is and are the Blueberries plentiful this year. Heading up there next Thursday fishing any help would be appreciated. Thanks Mike

I worked at the mine site in 2011.  The locals tell me that any of the lakes along the road to the mine site north of Cochrane are good for walleye.  Hope you do well.  Please let us know your results.
